chapter.title: Conclusion
chapter.para: The idea of log4sh is obviously not novel, but the availibility of such a powerful logging framework that is available in (nearly) pure shell is. Hopefully you will find it useful in one of your projects as well.
If you like what you see, or have any suggestions on improvements, please feel free to drop me an email at &myEmail;.
